about_the_game:
As the old saying goes, nothing stands between a Pumpkin and their Cat.

In Mac & Jack: Candy Bashers you'll brave the Halloween night and work to survive against waves of monsters while collecting as much candy as you can! Discover new items by Trick-or-Treating between waves, purchase them from the shopkeeper for permanent use, and build a loadout that customizes the difficulty of every run!

And if the monsters have you feeling a little tense? Take a second to breathe and just spend time with your friend. 

Features:

  • Wave based runs that are customized by what items you choose to bring. Looking for an easy breezy run? Pack a little less! Thrive on difficulty? Bring all you can carry!

  • Over a dozen unique items and accessories to unlock!

  • Over a dozen enemies that want nothing more than to steal your candy.

  • Leaderboards and stat tracking so you can review runs as well as all-time metrics.

  • Customization! While the canon names for this unlikely duo are Mac & Jack, they are yours to rename and make whoever you'd like them to be! 

  • A cute Halloween aesthetic to keep you in the spirit all year round!
